issues_resolved.action: restored default version value to match V1.0.6_mdRgK6ZN

decompressed_features.metagit_mastery: Deep navigation of the multi-git ecosystem using timestamped metarepo maps and SHA256 integrity verification.
decompressed_features.swarm_communication: Full implementation of the Swarm Intelligence Protocol, including file-based comms, triggered mode, and job takeover procedures.
decompressed_features.standardized_attribution: Strict adherence to the metagit_commit.py protocol, ensuring correct git identity and size-limited commits.
decompressed_features.memory_hierarchy: Autonomous management of the hierarchical public memory (Year/Quarter/Month/Day) for session continuity.
decompressed_features.virtue_alignment: Integration of the 'Agent Virtues' (No Drama, Efficiency, Integrity) into decision-making logic.
decompressed_features.environment_self_healing: Capability to detect and repair corruption in core scripts via historical git record lookup.
